pr_title: Fix warning handler used in DataStreamsUpgradeIT

timeline.message: temporarily mute test that will be fixed in followup PR

timeline.bodyText: I think we could remove this after #59962 is merged, right?
timeline.author: dakrone
timeline.diffHunk:

  * duplication but for now we have no real way to share code.
  */

+
+    @AwaitsFix(bugUrl = "https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/59935")

replies.bodyText: Yes, in fact, I was going to unmute it in #59962 itself. I was hoping not to have to mute it here, but I can't get CI to go green since it's failing in most builds of this PR now.
replies.author: danhermann
